content.text: I'm doing good! I just got back from a local antique store, and I bought a beautiful vase that I'm now displaying in my living room.
That's awesome! I love antique stores. I've been wanting to go to one for a while now, but I just haven't had the time.
You should definitely go! I always find something interesting at antique stores.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family, go running, and read.
I like to spend time with my family too. I also like to exercise and read.
That's great! We have something in common.
Yeah! I'm glad to hear that.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and mysteries.
I like those too! I also like to read romance novels.
I've never read a romance novel, but I've heard they're good.
They are! I love the way they make me feel.
I'll have to give one a try sometime.
